text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
September 15, 1958
119 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
Dr. Samuel L. Becker
454 Riverside Drive, Apt. 61
New York 2 7, New York
Dear Sam:
Just between trips and will try to read your survey on plane to or from New York.
One concern: That having sent to Crary, it will become a Center publication
(as Kumata's, done here, also did), I'd like to keep the NAEB itself in this,
more and more.
More when I have a chance to read.
Sincerely
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJS:jg
